title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sab se apne kala ke safar ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Ye safar shuru hua bachpan mein, jab meri maa mujhe rang aur kagaz laa kar deti thi.

Anushka: Mujhe yaad hai, mai un rangon se deewaron par ajeeb-o-gareeb cheezein banati thi, aur maa kabhi nahi daantati thi!

Anushka: School mein, drawing class meri favourite thi. Baki subjects se jyada mai ismein dil lagati thi.

Anushka: Lekin ek samay aaya jab mujhe laga ki art sirf ek hobby hai, career nahi.

Anushka: Phir college mein, ek dost ne mujhe ek art exhibition dikhayi.

Anushka: Wahan maine dekha ki kala sirf drawing nahi, ek zariya hai apni baat kehne ka.

Anushka: Us din maine decide kiya, mai apne passion ko kabhi nahi chodungi.

Anushka: Shuru mein mushkilein ayi. Log kehte the, "art se kya hoga?"

Anushka: Par maine haar nahi mani. Maine online courses kiye, workshops attend kiye, aur practice karti rahi.

Anushka: Dheere dheere meri art mein sudhar aaya, aur logon ne mujhe pehchanna shuru kiya.

Anushka: Aaj main apni art se khush hoon, aur main ummeed karti hoon ki meri kahani aapko apne passion ko follow karne ke liye inspire karegi.

Anushka: Yaad rakhiye, kala sirf ek talent nahi, ek safar hai. Aur har safar apne aap mein khoobsurat hota hai. Dhanyavad!
